inn1.comm: short and wide outside off stump to begin with, Ganguly reaches for it but doesnt time the slap/cut well at all
fuller and wider this time, Ganguly drives loosely but bat makes no contact with ball
full outside off stump, he walks into the shot and drives to mid-off
good length ball comes back into him, and he goes back and defends back to Bradshaw
overpitched outside off stump, he eases into the drive and cover doesnt stop it cleanly, so Gambhir gets off the mark too
full outside off stump, he leaves it alone
full again, this time he gets down on one knee and drives to point, where Samuels dives very well and saves runs
good length well outside off stump, Gambhir judges it well and shoulders arms
full outside off stump, he drives but cant beat cover this time
slower one on a good length, pitches on about middle and leg and moves away from him, he taps it to point
very full and wide, he has to reach for it but it stays very low and rolls to the 'keeper, wide signalled
very full and wide again, almost a low ful toss, which the batsman has to reach for and slap to backward point
good length outside off stump, slower ball, and he gets forward and defends to point
good length outside off stump, Gambhir walks down the track and drives to cover, not timed well though

whoah! A wayward, short of a length delivery moving well down the pads, Gambhir tries to work it around the corner and there's a noise as he nibbles it, Ramdin collects, they all go up in appeal, and Bowden raises the crooked finger! West Indies make early inroads!
back of a length outside off stump, Dravid stands tall and drops the soft hands on it, killing the ball into the turf outside off stump
short of a length again, little more pace on it, he again goes up and plays it down into the ground
back of a length on and around off stump, Dravid hops back and defends with an angled bat
short and wide, asking for trouble, but Ganguly leans back and lazily drives to Samuels at backward point
back of a length outside off stump, he stands tall and defends to the off side
slower, on a good length on the stumps, Ganguly shuffles across and works it to midwicket for one
fuller on leg stump, he gets over it and tickles it fine for one to open his account
good ball, on a good length outside off stump, Gangulys feet go nowhere as he feels for it, a puff of dust as the ball  nipped off the surface
fuller this time outside off stump, he neatly drives to mid-off for one
bad ball, too full and angling way down leg side, Ganguly goes for the big heave off the pads but misses, wide called
another wide down the legs, rubbish bowling
shorter outside off stump and Ganguly flays the bat at it, uppercutting well over the slips and landing safely in front of third man, streaky shot that
back of a length on middle and leg, he goes back and works it straight to backward square leg
again he strays down leg and Dravid times the little nudge off the pads superbly, playing close to the body and rolling the wrists excellently, finding the gap behind square leg and collecting four
good length on the stumps, Dravid pushes back past the bowler and calls for the quick single, they run well and get in with ease
back of a length on off stump, Ganguly goes back and across and works it to the onside for one more
back of a length outside off stump and staying low, Dravid does well to drop the soft hands on it and runs it to backward point, who fields well
back of a length outside off stump, Ganguly plays with the angled bat and runs it fine, but Morton at slip dives well to his left and stops it

oh ho! A slower, fuller ball to which Ganguly again opens the face of the bat, looking to run it fine, theres a clear noise and deviation off the bat, they appeal but umpire Saheba is unmoved! Perhaps he didnt hear it in the tumult, but thats a life for Ganguly! Very unfortunate for West Indies
touch fuller outside off, Ganguly guides it down to square third man
fuller on the stumps, he drives to mid-on
on the legs this time, Dravid drives to mid-on
shot! Strays to the leg side again, and Dravid clips that off the pads through square leg for four
good length delivery outside off stump, Ganguly opens the face of the bat and angles it to deep backward point
back of length down leg stump, and sublime flick off the hips brings Dravid his third four in good time, very well played
overpitched outside off stump, he pushes firmly back down the ground past mid-off and collects three this time
back of a length outside off stump, Ganguly opens the face and runs it to gully, Dravid wants the run but Ganguly was ball-watching, in the end they communicate well enough and get the run
short of a length outside off stump, Dravid rocks back and punches it to cover, ball hit the bottom of the bat
short of a length on middle and leg, this time he whips it square but cant beat midwicket
short and wide outside off stump, Ganguly pulls across the line but cant make contact, too early into this shot, and boy is this track slow and low, very, very sluggish
back of a length outside off stump, he runs it off the face of the angled bat right to backward point
good length outside off stump, he runs it to backward point again
short and wide, and this one sits up to be hit, and Ganguly makes room and smacks it over cover for his first four
slower ball on a short length, Ganguly shuffles and works it to midwicket for a sharp single
very full and wide outside off stump, stays extremely low too as Dravid flashes the drive away from his body and fails to make contact
overpitched on the stumps, Ganguly drives to mid-on
back of a length outside off stump, he stands tall and presents the full face of the bat back to Powell
attempted slow yorker, in the block hole, Ganguly digs it to mid-on
soft dismissal, if I've ever seen one! Short ball on middle and leg, stands up a touch, and all he does is work it off the hips ever so easily into the hands of Morton at short midwicket!
back of a length on leg stump, he hops and works it to square leg
another shortish delivery, he hops up again and defends to midwicket
short and wide, but he cant time the attempted back-foot slap through covers well
good length ball on off stump, slow and moving in this time, Dravid stands and waits for it, dropping the hands at the last minute
slower one ends up a full toss, but he didnt see it well, and ends up tapping it to short midwicket
good length, varied off cutter this time, and Dravid quickly has to defend
angling in, Dravid turns it to short midwicket
another slower delivery, touch fuller, and Dravid plays it to silly mid on
short of a good length outside off stump and he watchfully lets it go
fuller outside off stump, he gets a big stride forward to work the bounce and carry and defends to the off side
good length outside off stump, he drives but gets an inside edge to midwicket
gone, in another soft manner! A fullish off cutter on off stump, Tendulkar tries to flick on the up over the on side, but can only lob it up for the easiest of catches to mid-on
good length delivery angling in from outside off stump and Karthik plays it to mid-on
good length outside off stump and Karthik looks to defend it but gets rapped on the pads, theres a loud appeal, turned down, as the umpire ruled that the impact was outside the line of off stump
slow good length delivery outside off, kept a bit low, Dravid looks to cut, beaten by the bounce
good length outside off stump, doesnt time the drive well at all
much better! Short of a length outside off stump, slower ball, but he waits for it and punches very well off the back foot past mid-off for four
fuller this time and he gets forward and drives to mid-off
overpitched, Dravid meets the ball with a full face of the bat as he drives to mid-off, just cant beat the man there
back of a length and stays very low, and he has to adjust well to make sure that one doesnt shoot through
fullish outside off stump, slow again, and Karthik leaves it be
back of a length outside off stump and comes in slightly, he gets behind the line and defends compactly
full down the legs and Karthik clips it square, beating fine leg for four
good length outside off stump, the pacier delivery this time, to which Karthik shoulders arms with a decent stride forward
fuller and moving down leg stump, he falls over in his attempt to flick it fine and gets rapped on the pads outside the line of the stumps
good length outside off stump, quick one, and he raises the bat and allows it to pass
back of a length on middle and leg, Dravid rocks back and whips it to midwicket
short and wide and moving away from him, he flashes the cut but fails to make contact and Ramdin collects
good length on the legs, wristily whipped off the pads to Bravo at fine leg for the single
back of a length outside off stump, he gets forward and defends to the off side
good length outside off stump and he lets it pass
slower ball on a length but down leg, and he works it past square leg for one
pitched up, angling in, Karthik comes forward and plays it to silly mid-on
slow full toss outside off stump, slower one went all wrong, and he opens the face and guides it to third man
back of a length on the stumps, he goes back and defends
shorter on this occasion and he whips it to midwicket

great delivery gets his man! Good deception with the full, slower delivery that curls in from just outside off stump, and Dravid plays the wrong line, gets totally beaten by that gem and loses his furniture! Powell is in the middle of a fine spell here, and India are just slipping
bad ball, way down leg stump and wide is duly signalled
back of a length and down leg again, easy pickings for Dhoni, who works it around the corner for one to get off the mark
good length outside off stump, stays low and Dhoni has to adjust quickly, and he does well to keep that one out
back of a length this time, and he defends to the off side
another good length ball - good stuff from Bradshaw - and Dhoni gets well on top of it and defends to covers

another good length ball on off stump, Dhoni gets over it and plays with soft hands, the ball rolls to cover and Karthik wants the single, Dhoni has work to do and he sprints down the other side and just beats Dwayne Smith's terrific pick-and-throw
fuller ball outside off stump, he gets over it and defends
good length outside off stump, he gets on top and defends well to kill any movement or low bounce
slower one turns out a full toss on off stump, which Dhoni punches in front of Devon Smith in front of mid-on for a quick run that brings up the 50 for India
fuller ball on off stump, Karthik gets a stride forward and defends
fuller outside off stump, pitches and comes in, Karthik shuffles and looks to work it to leg, gets saved by the inside edge
full on middle and leg, clipped fine out to Bradshaw at deep fine leg, and Dhoni calls for the second and they get it with ease, well judged against the slow arm of Bradshaw
full outside off stump, he reaches for it and guides it to Samuels at backward point
slower one, full again, and Karthik gets well outside the line and squeezes it to backward point
back of a length on leg stump, stays low too, Dhoni works it around the corner to short fine leg
good length on leg stump, Karthik gets a stride or two down the track and converts it into a full delivery and flicks wide of square leg, good running compliments the innovative shot
good length on the stumps, he comes forward and defends stoically
good length on off stump, he works it across the line with soft hands and places it in front of mid-on, calling for the sharp single and his partner responds very well
slower delivery, rolled the fingers over it, pitched on leg and moved away to off stump, but was very short in length and Dhoni gets behind the line and defends
good length outside off stump, defended to the off side
a fuller length outside off stump, he leans into his shot and square-drives wide of backward point for a brace
slow, fuller one on off stump, Karthik gets forward and flicks to midwicket, yes,no,yes,no is the call as the fielder misfields, two men give chase and in the end they dont take the run
good length on the stumps, he gets behind the line and defends
full and moving down leg, Karthik places the flick well out to Bradshaw at deep long leg and collects two
full outside off stump, he kneels down and square-drives to backward point
good length just outside off stump, Karthik walks into the shot and inside-edges back onto his front pad
good length on the stumps, Dhoni gets back and defends back to the bowler
fuller outside off stump, he reaches for it and drives to backward point
slower ball on a short length on leg stump, defended
just back of a length outside off stump, Dhoni dangerously backs away and punches it to short extra cover
short of a good length on middle and leg, Dhoni just goes back and deflects it to the leg side and they trot through for the single
fuller on the stumps, and its greeted with a nice frontfoot defence
slower and full on the stumps, Dhoni gets forward and pushes down the ground, mid-on is quick to react and cuts it off
full and moving down leg, really slow ball, Dhoni flicks but cant beat Morton at square leg
slower one on a good length, he hops and works it fine and this time they sprint through
short and wide, Karthik stands up on the toes and slaps that smack between point and gully and the ball races away to the ropes for four
back of a length and moving in, he plays it with soft hands and defends to point
good length on the stumps, played with soft hands to midwicket
short of a length on off stump, dangerously chipped in the air but in front of midwicket

gone! Another soft dismissal! Wasnt the greatest ball, slow on a full length just on off stump, Dhoni gets half-forward and plays with an angled bat, just closing the face of the bat, and scoops it back off the leading edge to Smith for a simple caught-and-bowled
full down the legs, tries to clip but gets rapped on the leg outside the line of impact
fuller again on middle and leg, clipped to midwicket
fuller outside off stump, he leans into a good-looking drive but right to mid-off
good length outside off stump, he gets forward and defends with one hand to backward point
back of a length outside off stump, he opens the face and runs it to third man
good length on off stump, Joginder looks to hit it through the line, inside-edges it to fine leg
slower delivery on target, Karthik comes on the frontfoot and plays it back to the bowler
slow and fuller outside off stump, Karthik drives it to Gayle at silly mid-off
fuller this time, he comes down and drives to Bradshaw at mid-off, whos slow to move, and picks up one

cleaned him up! Fuller ball outside off stump, moves in a tad, and Joginder's feet go nowhere, he just drives loosely away from his body, hitting through the line is a cardinal sin on this track, and the balls sneaks through the wide gap and disturbs the stumps! India in a real mess, West Indies truly on top!
strays down leg side and its clipped down to fine leg for four, good shot
a touch fuller on this time, and Karthik plays it out to gully
good length on leg stump and he works it to short fine leg, and wants a single but is sent back in time
good length outside off stump, Karthik opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man, where Powell fumbles and allows the second
pitched up, Karthik leans forward and plays it back to the bowler
on the legs, Karthik turns it to square leg
good length on off stump, he gets forward and plays across the front pad
good length again, driven to covers
touch fuller outside off stump, Harbhajan plays it to short cover
good length delivery outside off stump, again he drives to short cover
opts for the half-tracker and Harbhajan ducks under it, wide called
good length outside off stump, defended
good length again, defended to the off side
pitched up, on the off, Karthik plays it to mid-off
good length outside off stump, Karthik opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man
good length on the stumps, defended back down the track
overpitched but he cant put the half-volley away, ends up mistiming the drive to cover
good length on off stump, he comes forward and plays in front of the front pad
back of a length on off stump, he stands and defends back to the bowler
back of a length, he gets behind the line and defends
short and wide, cracked off the backfoot to Morton at backward point, who stops it very well
fuller on off stump, he comes forward and flicks to midwicket
full outside off stump, he gets to the pitch and drives down the ground, but cant beat a moving mid-off
slower ball outside off stump, Karthik comes forward and drives back to Powell
too short, too wide, just sits up and Karthik pulls across the line and clubs it over midwicket for a boundary
angling in on the legs, Harbhajan turns it to square leg
fuller outside off stump, he reaches for it and works it to the leg side via the inside edge
fuller outside off stump, a half-volley, but he cant drive it well and misses all ends up
good length outside off stump, kept quite low, Harbhajan looks to push it but misses
overpitched again, and Harbhajan says enough is enough! Was in the slot, and he heaves it down the ground, lot of bottom hand, and smacks it wide of mid-on for four and breaks the shackles
heave ho! Looking to smack it into the deep midwicket stands, he has another swipe across the line but fails to make contact!
good length outside off stump, he runs it to backward point
back of a length, punched off the back foot to mid-on
back of a length again, worked to midwicket this time
short of a length on leg stump, he works it to square leg and sets off, Dwayne Smith swoops in, collects, and fires in at the nonstriker's end, hitting Harbhajan in  the ribs
back of a length outside off stump, steered to backward point
back of a length again, this time he runs it fine to third man to retain strike
short and wide, Karthik cuts wide of backward point out to the sweeper and wants two, but Harbhajan wisely sends him back
short again, but Harbhajan cant connect
fuller on off stump, he comes forward and defends back to the bowler
overpitched outside off stump, he jams the bat down and runs it to backward point
good length on the stumps, turned off the front leg to midwicket
full and slow on middle and leg, Harbhajan flicks well out to wide mid-on and they settle for the single
good length on the stumps, Harbhajan runs it to backward point with some confidence
good length again, stump-to-stump bowling this, and he drives out to cover
back of a length outside off stump, but just fractionally, and Harbhajan plays it to point again
back of a length on off stump, he gets behind the line and plays back to the bowler
good length outside off stump, no room on offer, and Harbhajan has to defend it once more
bowled! Another simple, good length delivery just outside off stump, doesnt do anything at all and Harbhajan plays down the wrong line, bringing the bat down late and losing his off stump!
worked away towards midwicket, no room for a single there
driven down to mid-on, again no single
good length delivery on the stumps, worked away on the leg side with no real intent
and the slower delivery, which as we have seen is lethal weapon on this track, Agarkar too is bit early into the shot and the ball rolls away off the leading edge
wicket to wicket delivery, defended outside the off stump
forced away off the back-foot to the cover region
driven down to long-on, runs coming in a trickle here
good length delivery on the stumps, worked away well to the midwicket region
quicker delivery and Agarkar finds the fielder at cover
edge produced but the ball runs down to the thirdman fence, good length delivery outside the off stump. Agarkar plays away from his body and ends up with a thick edge
driven straight to the fielder at cover, the usual
fuller length delivery outside the off stump and Karthik drives it away towards cover point
defended outside the off stump
good length delivery outside the off stump, ball clips the inside edge and rolls away towards square leg
clipped away off the pad to deep square leg, each and every run being cheered here
wayward delivery down the leg side and the extra takes the Indian total to 100! crowd erupts as if India have won the World Cup. Great sense of humour
and India have won another World Cup final - fulltoss on the pads and Agarkar clips it away beautifully through square leg, long chase ends in vain
defended outside the off stump
good length delivery, driven straight to the fielder at cover point
fuller and on the stumps, punched straight back to the bowler
forced away off the back-foot and Karthik beats the fielder at cover point, there is a buzz around the stadium now
bit of width offered and Agarkar cuts hard but finds the fielder at point
full and drifting down the leg side, the keeper was standing up to the stumps and he had no chance of cutting it off
worked away off the pads to the square leg region, yet another easy single added to the total and finally it looks like India are on the move
wide outside the off stump and Karthik leaves it through to the keeper
in the slot and Karthik drives it down to long-on for a single
starts off with a wayward delivery down the leg side and the ball once again beats Ramdin, five more added to the tota
lobs up a fulltoss on the pads and Karthik smokes it through midwicket, stunning hit from the youngster
goes for the sweep and the ball rolls away off the pad
worked away on the leg side for a single
Agarkar too goes for the sweep but fails to make contact
driven down to long-on for an easy single
driven wide of the fielder at cover, 15 off the over
good length delivery, Agarkar just lines it up and lofts it down to the long-on fence, good clean hit
again clipped away off the pad for two more
worked away behind square on the leg side and easy single takes him to his fifty!  Fantastic knock from Karthik
clipped away to deep midwicket, there is protection in the deep.
driven down to long-on, the last two overs have produced 25 runs and this are on the move for India here.
full on off stump, he drives one-handed down the ground to long-on
attempted yorker doesnt come out right, Agarkar drives it to widish mid-off and goes for a quick single
slower ball moving in from outside off stump, he plays across the front pad and works it to the on side, but no chance of a run there
lovely! Overpitched outside off stump and he gets to the pitch, driving gloriously in the gap at mid-off for four
back of a length outside off stump, he plays away from his body, running it down to third man
full and well wide of off stump, Agarkar has to really reach for it and ends up guiding it to backward point
good length on the stumps, chopped to backward point
terrible ball, really short and wide of leg stump
short and wide, cut past point out to the sweeper on the ropes, easy single
back of length, played with soft hands and Karthik is halfway down the track and they get an easy single
good length on leg stump, Karthik glances it to backward square leg, he wanted the second but stumbles at the bowler's end and ended up with just one
slower fuller length delivery outside off stump, Agarkar looks to play it with soft hands but gets beaten
good length delivery outside off stump, Agarkar plays it straight to Samuels at backward point
slower, on a good length outside off stump, he looks to run it fine but misses
full and wide, he leaves it be and then looks up at the umpire, who stands unmoved
good length outside off stump, the offcutter perhaps, that moves in and catches him in the midriff as he plays across the line
fuller this time on the stumps, and he drives to cover
overpitched on middle and leg, and Karthik walks down the track and deliberately whips that over square leg for four, premeditated and worth the effort
good length on the stumps, looks to dab it to the offside but gets an inside egde between the legs
good length on the stumps, worked to midwicket, theres a misfield and they get one

gone! Bradshaw rolls the fingers over this one, landing it short of a length on leg stump and getting it to curl away, Karthik just stands there, attempting to run it fine, but the ball wins this battle and knocks back middle stump
back of a length, and he crashes that fiercely to cover
good length on leg stump and he's off the mark with a wristy little flick past square  leg
good length just outside off stump, he stands and drops the hands on it, dead-batting it to the off side, Agarkar scrambles back in his crease
back of a length outside off stump, he plays it late and with soft hands, running it to third man
short of a length and Agarkar squeezes it past backward point out to Taylor at wide third man, and wants two, but Powar is sluggish and they have to contend with one
short of a length outside off stump, driven off the backfoot just wide of mid-off for one
fuller and slower, has Powar in a tangle as he gets over it and looks to work it to the leg side, somehow the ball snuck through and didnt clip the stumps
back of a length outside off stump, he reaches for it and drives to point
moving down leg, he taps it to square leg and gets sent back as the fielder swoops in
full on middle and leg, he flicks out past square leg to the fielder in the deep, now Agarkar wants two but Powar wisely sends him back
pitches short of a good length outside off stump and swings in a good deal, but Agarkar is upto task and runs it wide of backward point
overpitched wide of off stump, and he deftly runs that down to third man
speared into leg stump, the yorker, Powar looks to flick but gets the bat before it nips onto the boot, and was missing leg stump anyways
slow, real slow, on a full length outside off stump, he wafts at it and gets beaten
overpitched and he drives nicely down the ground, Powell at mid-off dives to his right and saves runs
all over! Pitches on a good length on middle and leg, in a rush of blood Powar has an ungainly swipe across the line, fails to connect, and loses the top of middle stump, India nine down
slow, low full toss outside off stump, he opens the face and runs it wide of backward point for one
good length on the stumps, Zaheer comes forward and just nudges in front of point to give Agarkar the strike
speared into leg stump, flicked wide of Dwayne Smith at midwicket
moving down leg stump and the umpire spreads the arms, West Indies dont need that right now, every runs a bonus for the hosts
good length outside off stump, the slower one, nicely picked up and steered wide of backward point for one
attempted yorker, but no swing, Agarkar gets across and works it to mid-on
good length outside off stump, run to backward point and he sets off, but comes back into his crease, wisely
back of a length this time, again he chops into the off side and then sends Agarkar back as point, the bowler, and 'keeper all descend on the ball
full toss on middle and leg, Agarkar works that straight to Dwayne Smith at midwicket
overpitched outside off stump, Agarkar jams the bat down late and misses, Ramdin fumbles the take
slighly overpitched again, he gets to the pitch and drives into the covers for one
spears in the attempted yorker outside off stump, Zaheer gets the bat down well enough and pinches one in front of cover
rubbish ball again, a wide well outside off stump, Agarkar had to reach across a long way and missed it
good length outside off stump, he looks to cream it through the off side but ends up with an inside-edge to fine leg
sloppy, real sloppy, another wide well down the leg side
full toss outside off stump, he hops and steers it to backward point, who fields well and cuts off any ideas of a sharp single
full down the legs, a full toss actually, and Agarkar cashes in, putting it away down  the leg side, and as fine leg was up he got an easy four
short of a length and easily swinging down leg for another wide, shocking really
low full toss outside off stump, Agarkar drives right to cover, didnt cash in that time
slower one on a good length, swings in from middle and off sharply, and Agarkar taps it wide of short fine leg for one
another dreadful full toss down leg stump, Zaheer clips it down to deep backward square leg for one
overpitched on middle and leg, punched down to Taylor at long-on for one more
slower ball, the yorker, on middle and off but Zaheer reads it well and defends back to Smith
slower, full outside off stump, Agarkar cant get bat on ball
good ball, slower outside off stump, he drives in the air and it lands well in front of Bradshaw at cover
overpitched again, down on one knee he goes, crashing the booming drive, but again he cant beat Bradshaw positioned at cover
back of a length outside off stump, steered to the left of Samuels at backward point for a very risky single
full outside off stump, steered to Samuels again
full and wide, he runs that off the open face but cant  beat Samuels again
in the slot to be driven, but he cant beat cover
full again, he drives lustily but cant beat Samuels at backward point
drifting down leg, he has an almighty heave but doesnt connect, and settles for the leg bye
overpitched on the legs and he flicks that high in the air over midwicket, the ball lands safely in front of the fielder and two more are added to the total
fullish outside off stump, driven into the covers for one
full toss down leg stump, worked off the hips out to backward square leg
good yorker on the stumps, Zaheer does well to jam the bat down on it and keep it from hitting the stumps

all over! Pitches full down leg stump, Zaheer heaves across the line, misses, and responds to the call for the leg bye as the ball rolls to the on side, but in a remarkable display of football skills, Bravo sprints down the track, slides, and parries the ball onto the stumps before Agarkar can ground his bat

inn2.comm: full on the pads, and he chips that nicely through midwicket to get the innings off
good length outside off stump, driven into the covers
full outside off stump, driven but right to mid-off
this one stays low off a good length, and moves in, and he is saved by the thick inside edge back onto the boot, sneaking a run in front of square leg
good length ball outside off stump, pitches and shaves away from his forward prod
fuller, a tad, and he drops the hands, pushing into the covers

and he strikes first ball! A nippy, back of a length delivery on the stumps, Gayle is fairly leaden-footed, basically plodding the foot an inch or two in front of the stumps, and is rapped dead in front, though there was a noise, suggesting an inside edge....but no, replays show there was no inside edge, it was a legitimate decision from the umpire
good length outside off stump, he dead-bats that to point
good length again, and he defends to the off side
quicker, on a good length, and Smith defends neatly to the off side
back of a length outside off stump, he drives out to Dravid at cover

a tad fuller, and Smith plonks the bat and pad forward, but just, and is rapped on the pads in front of the stumps, but this time there was a clear inside-edge, and the elongated appeal is shunned by the umpire
back of a length on off stump, Chanderpaul gets behind it and turns it to the leg side, but sends Smith back into his crease at the other end
back of a length outside off stump, steered to Gambhir at backward point
good movement in the air, swinging onto off stump and then curling away, Chanderpaul defends to the off side
well bowled! Full and swinging away from the bat just outside off stump, and he's suckered into a tame forward prod
fuller this time, and he drops the bat on it, steering to Karthik at an orthodox point
overpitched, and Chanderpaul leans into a lovely drive between mid-off and cover, no chance of stopping that
back of a length outside off stump, stays low, but Smith negates it well, driving to Joginder at mid-off
back of a length and moving away outside off stump, Smith steers it late and with soft hands wide of slip to get off the mark
good length just outside off stump, Chanderpaul opens the face and runs it to Karthik at point
wider this time, short of a length outside off stump, and he decides to leave it alone
good length outside off stump, he opens the face and runs it wide of slip down to Gambhir at third man
overpitched, fractionally, and Smith thumps a drive back down the ground, but Agarkar sticks his right hand out, intercepts it, and feigns a shy back at the batsman
overpitched on middle and leg, Chanderpaul whips that backward of square out to Powar in the deep, who collects it and slips in the dew
overpitched, he drives down the ground, Joginder moves to his left from mid-off and intercepts it
full again, he drives straight and Zaheer takes it in his follow-through, and then lines up to throw it back at him with a wry smile
short and wide, a bit slower, Smith cant time the backfoot cut at all
rolls the fingers over the offcutter, but it slides down leg stump and raps Smith outside the line
this one rears off the surface sharply into Smith's ribs, and he does well to adjust and play it late away in front of square leg
another slower one on a good length on off stump, he  plays it loosely and the ball pops up in front of cover
stays low off a short length on off stump, Smith hurries to get the back down on the ball
back of a length on leg stump, he hops and turns it right to square leg
short of a length outside off stump, Smith cracks that into the covers, where Dravid moves quickly and fires in the throw, which is agonizingly close to the stumps
back of a length and moving down leg, Chanderpaul allows the ball to come onto him and then turns it wide of square leg for easy runs
fuller outside off stump, he leans into it and steers it to Karthik at point, who collects it and fires it back onto the stumps, and they collect one courtesy the ricochet
back of a length, steered to Karthik at point again
fuller and slower outside off stump, he plans the foot forward and then shoulders arms
slower and fuller once again, he comes forward and drops the bat, and the ball rolls close to off stump, sort of spinning off the rotation
back of a length and moving into him, again he waits for it and turns it to square leg
short of a good length outside off stump, thumped to Karthik at point
back of a length, he drives away from his body and gets a thick outside edge down to third man
good length on the stumps, whipped to square leg
full once more, and again he cant beat the man at midwicket, thats Harbhajan
straighter on a good length, Smith gets behind the line and defends back to Agarkar
short and wide, he rocks back and cuts, but can beat Gambhir at a forward point position, his timing has eluded him on this buzzing evening
fuller this time, he jams the bat down and plays it out to cover
back of a length, he stands up and drives off the back foot, but cant beat the packed off side, and thats a maiden to Agarkar
short of a length outside off stump, Chanderpaul swivels into position and pulls, rolling the wrists nicely, and collects two through square out to Powar on the ropes
back of a length outside off stump, he plays it late in the gap at point, Karthik dives to his right and gets a hand to it, slowing the pace, but theres an easy one taken
fuller outside off stump, he jams the hands down in time, and gets an inside edge between the legs
full outside off stump, he comes forward and then refrains from any sort of shot
straighter, on a good length on off stump, Smith stands up and presents the full face of the bat back to Zaheer
shorter this time, Smith gets fancy and tries some sort of shivel-pull on the hop, but he's in such a mess that he makes no contact at all
good length outside off stump, he feels at it and gets the edge, but it lands just in front of Dhoni, who procedes to fumble the stop and allows a run
good length outside off stump, he gets forward and steers it to Karthik at backward point
good length outside off stump, he drives but just cant beat anyone on the offside
thats rubbish, really wide of leg stump and Dhoni collects it
fuller on the stumps, he defends with an inside-edge to the leg side
back of a length on off stump, he defends uneasily, and there was a sharp puff of dust off the surface
fuller, he drives straight down the ground and the ball his the stumps at the other end
slower one on a good length, stays very low too, and Chanderpaul is beaten going for a leaden-footed cut
back of a length on the stumps, he works that to midwicket
back of a length outside off stump, punched into the covers
slower, and fuller, and finally Smith times his drive through the off side, and picks up a brace
back of a length now, and he hops and defends off the back foot to Gambhir at point
shorter length on middle and leg, up on the toes he goes, turning to to midwicket
good length on middle and leg, he looks to play it square but gets cramped, ends up playing to midwicket
fuller, driven to Gambhir in the off side
overpitched, Chanders looks uneasy driving to cover
good length slower one, pitched on leg and moved away, Chanderpaul did well to play it with an angled bat to gully
now thats a shot, sir! Fractionally overpitched, though not a half-volley, and Smith gets on top of it, square-driving through the packed offside field and picking up four
good length again, this time he drives to mid-off
short and wide, back he goes, cracking the cut in the air where gully could have been, and getting an easy one down to Joginder at third man
slower off cutter outside off stump, Smith cant time his cover drive and ends up hitting down into the dust in front of Zaheer, who hops and collects in his followthrough
shorter, and he cracks that off the backfoot but cant beat Karthik at backward point
good length outside off stump, he hops and feels at it, getting a thick edge along the ground, Ganguly dives brilliantly at gully and saves runs
the short one, Smith gets up on one leg and whips that to Tendulkar at midwicket
short and wide, he cracks the cut and cant beat Ganguly at a more orthodox gully this time
back of a length on off stump, defended into the off side
good length outside off stump, he gets a step forward and drives to point
straighter this time, and he works that wristily to Harbhajan at square leg for the single
fuller on off stump, driven into the off side
close call! Pitches on a sweet length, slower one, and it shaves past the outside edge of Smith's forward lunge
back of a length this time, and he gets back and works the wrists very well over it, finding the big gap between midwicket and square leg for his second boundary, well played

short of a length outside off stump, Chanderpaul runs that nicely in the gap behind point, runs one, Smith wants the second, it was there for the taking, but Chanderpaul isnt interested, and as Smith turns to run back, he loses balance and falls down smack in the middle of the pitch, and Dhoni whips off the bails!
good length on the stumps, he hurries to defend
good length on the stumps, defended back to the bowler again
fuller, a fraction, Samuels defends and the ball nearly rolls onto his stumps
fuller on off stump, Samuels drives to Zaheer at mid-on, who has a shy at the stumps but misses, just
back of a length delivery on the stumps, no pace here at all, and Chanderpaul goes back and turns it to the on side
tossed up on off stump, defened to the on side, dust puffs up from where the ball landed
tossed up, driven into the packed off side cordon
back of a length, he goes back and defends in a hurry
flatter again, he gets back and drives to the off side

gone! Tossed up one middle and off, Samuels gets half forward and plays off the front leg, and the ball just flies off the inside edge into the hands of Gambhir at forward short leg, Bhajji strikes early!
good turn off the pitch, as it lands on a good length outside off stump and turns into him as he looks to leave it alone
good length outside off stump, steered to backward point

almost! A good length outside off stump, pushed into the off side, they set off, then there's confusion, Bravo is halfway down the track, no, more even, but Ganguly from mid-off cant hit the stumps and he's offered a big reprieve!
fuller outside off stump, he lets it pass through to Dhoni
good length on the stumps, he gets behind and defends back to Joginder
back of a length this time, he shuffles and deflects it to the on side
back of a length outside off stump, steered down to third man and he will keep strike
tossed up outside off stump, he defends back to Bhajji
fraction shorter, he runs it to the off side, second slip fields
moves around the stumps, fires one in quicker, defended to the off side
this ones quicker and curving into him, and he does well to defend it
tossed up outside the line of off stump, and he plants the front foot forward and pads it away
flatter outside off stump, he plays it to point
dragged in short this time, Bravo steps into it and heaves it over midwicket and the ball trickles over the ropes
better length, angled in from off stump, Bravo defends with a thick inside edge
good length on off stump, he comes forward and drives to mid-on
back of a length, angling in once more, Bravo plays it with soft hands and picks up one in front of mid-on
good length, but pitched outside leg stump, rapped Chanders on the leg but the impact was outside the line, Bowden shakes his head to an very optimistic appeal from Joginder
change of place, rolls the fingers over it and Chanderpaul is beaten outside off stump, ball kept low too
tossed up well outside off stump, Bravo doesnt read it and the ball pops up off the pad safely in front of Gambhir at forward short leg
tossed up down leg, Bravo sweeps across the line, the ball turns a heck of a lot, they all appeal but it was clearly spinning down leg stump
tossed up outside off stump, he gets a stride forward and eases into a great cover drive that speeds away through the vacant gap for four
tossed up on off stump and it spins down leg stump, Bravo sweeps, gets rapped outside the line again, they appeal but the umpire is unmoved
flatter trajectory outside off stump, played out to point
quicker one on a good length, played back to Harbhajan
good length slipping down leg stump, Bravo looks to pick up runs wide of square leg but doesnt time it well
dropped in short, Bravo comes down the track and tries to make it fuller, doesnt time it cleanly but has enough bat on it to beat a diving mid-off for four
Dhoni comes upto the stumps, Joginder pitches full, Bravo drives, misses, and the ball scoots through Dhoni for a couple of byes
good length on off stump, Bravo plays well in front of his front pad but doesnt time it well
short of a good length outside off stump, up on the toes he goes, driving back to Joginder
now he drops it short and well down leg stump, Bravo swivels in the pull, getting enough bat on it to help it on its way over the deep fine leg ropes, evading Agarkar on the run down there
tossed up well outside off stump, he pads it away
fired in quicker just on off stump, he defends to cover
spinning away wide of off stump, left alone
short and wide, trouble if you bowl there, and Chanderpaul nicely cuts that in the gap behind point for four, top shot
spinning into him from outside off stump, he allows it to come on and then turns the wrists at the last moment, picking up one wide of square leg
flatter on off stump, Bravo goes and back and drives back to Bhajji
tossed up outside the line of off stump, Chanderpaul pads it away
looped up on off stump, driven back to Powar
flatter, spinning away from middle and leg, Chanderpaul shuffles and works it to square leg
tossed up on off, nicely swept around the corner for one, he prefers that shot
tossed up on off stump, Chanderpaul gets forward and kills the spin
pitches on leg and spins into him, he plays it late and defends to silly point
flatter and spinning down leg stump, Bravo goes back and firmly works it fine, Karthik dives well at square leg and saves runs
flatter this time, Bravo gets a step forward and plays it back to Harbhajan
quicker again, he comes down again and defends to the off side
tossed up on middle and leg, he sweeps around the corner
flatter on middle and leg, back he goes, working it to square leg
flatter down leg, Bravo sweeps again
bad ball, very short on middle and leg and he spots it very easily, just slamming it high and handsome over deep backward square leg for half a dozen, first six of the match
tossed up on a good length, he comes down the track and defends
flatter on off stump, defended back to Powar
flatter on off and middle, he goes back and defends
fuller and quicker outside off stump, steered wide of slip for one
flatter trajectory, he goes back and works it around the corner for one
tossed up outside off stump, he sees the big gap on the off side and drives it right there for an easy single
quicker and flatter on middle and leg, worked to forward short leg
flat on leg stump, worked to backward short leg
tossed up on middle and off, he comes down and defends
tossed up down leg stump, easily swept out to deep fine leg, Sharma covers good ground from square leg
short and wide, he leans back and cuts wide of point, Zaheer is a little late getting the throw back in and thats a superb single stolen
gone! Powar tosses it up, lovely rotation on that ball, Bravo lunges forward in defence but plays with a slightly angled bat and Gambhir at forward short leg gobbles up the catch off the inside edge
tossed up again, Morton lunges forward and is beaten, the ball narrowly misses clipping leg stump and escapes for byes
this one turns square outside off stump and Morton  plays at it, feeling for it
tossed up outside off stump, again this turns sharply and Morton leaves it alone, wow that turned a lot!

bowled 'em! Powar tosses up another lethal ripper that pitches outside off stump and spins in a mile and Morton, clueless, prods half-forward and leaves it alone, only to look on in horror as the ball curls in to knock back off stump, classic offspinner's dismissal
drifting down the leg side, ball rolls away off the pad
forced away off the back to the cover pint region, easy single added to the total
steered away to the gully region, there was a single on offer there but Chanderpal is not interested
lofted straigth back over the bowler's head to long-on, Powar moves across and cuts off the second run
tossed up and defended outside the off stump
tapped away off the back-foot to the point region, another tight over comes to an end
worked away with the spin to the backward square leg region
ounched down to mid-off. just enough room and they scamper through for a single
take that! tossed up in the slot and turning in, Smith just hits on the up and the ball sails over the midwicket fence, top shot
comes forward and works it away
defended on the back-foot
defended stretching well forward, end of a good over for West Indies
defended outside the off stump
100 comes up. quicker and drifting down the leg side, wrong line and length. Chanderpaul stays back and at the last moment turns it away off his pads to the fine leg fence
forced away towards point and Chanderpaul takes off for a single but Smith stands his ground, fielder was bit late and Chanderpaul gets enought time to make it back safely
driven away towards cover
again forced away on the off side with no result
worked away off the pads to the sqaure leg region
driven away towards cover and this time they scamper through for a single
on the pads and Smith watchfully turns it away towards square leg
pitched outside the off stump and turning away, Chanderpaul lunges forward but leaves it through to the keeper
defended outside the off stump
worked away off the back-foot to the short fine leg region, yet another single added to the total. The required run rate is under control but wickets in hand is the problem area
fuller length delivery, defended on the front-foot
tossed up and turning away, Chanderpaul waits for the ball to turn and then taps it away towards cover point for a single
steered down to third man for an easy single, he is looking settled out there and that's not a good sign for India
opens the face of the bat and allows the ball to side away, well played
worked away towards fine leg
defended outside the off stump
forced away towards point, single to end the over
comes well forward and drives it down to long-off
fuller and quicker, defended outside the off stump
tossed up in the slot outside the off stump and Chanderpaul drills it through the gap on the off side, perfect timing and placement
better line and length and Chanderpaul defends it down watchfully
cut away off the back-foot and they scamper through for a single, lazy looking shot but effective - that's the way he plays
flatter on middle and leg, looks like leg spin, Chanderpaul works it to square leg for one
moves back over the stumps to the right-hander, and gets one to spin away from him as he drives expansively, that was 100ks on the leg cutter
very short and wide, little spin, Smith cant time the cut well yet picks up one to the covers
tossed up sharply down leg stump, he works it fine but cant beat the fielder
tossed up down leg stump again, this time he places it wide of short fine leg and picks up three to bring up his half-century, very well played sir
spinning away from outside off stump, he reaches for it and drives it to Zaheer at backward point
tossed up on leg stump and it spins to off stump, well played, late too, by Chanderpaul
floated wide off off stump, left alone
spinning into him from middle and leg, he gets over it and smothers the movement
short and wide, easy work for Chanderpaul, who slaps it wide of point for one

tossed up outside off stump and it spins in sharply, Smith walks across the stumps and takes it high on the back leg, so he was outside the line and that ball was probably spinning over the top of middle and off
tossed up, fuller, he gets to it and sweeps fine, cant beat the man there
short and wide, spinning away, steered to backward point
this is flatter and spins into him, he works it to square leg with ease
tossed up just outside off stump, and the leg break spins a mile past his bat, lots of dust flying out from where it pitched
short, flat, back he goes, punching firmly off  the backfoot superbly and it bisects two converging men on the ropes and meets the boundary
the off spinner now, spins into him from a short length
more middle and leg, worked to midwicket
tossed up well down the leg stump, turns sharply, Smith tries to sweep, misses, and a wide is called
tossed up, spins in sharply and catches him on the back leg but there was too much happening on that ball
again he drifts down the leg stump and Smith plays it with the spin, helping it on its way around the corner for two
tossed up, he plants the front foot forward and heaves it across the line, flat as can be, for half a dozen over deep midwicket, lovely, aggressive stroke
middle and leg again, worked to midwicket for one
tossed up, he comes comes onto the frontfoot and defends it&
tossed up, he defends and the ball almost rolls onto the stumps
short and wide, bad ball, Smith reaches for it and slaps it in the air towards Zaheer at backward point

Tendulkar strikes with an innocuous delivery! It was short and turning away from Smith but he rocks back, eyeing the on side, and only succeeds in getting under the stroke and holing out to Powar at wide long-on
tossed up from around the wicket, it ends up a full toss that he punches down to long-on, where an elementary fielding error from Joginder - the gap between the legs - gives up the second
full on middle and leg, driven to midwicket for one
tossed up outside off stump, the leg break, spins away sharply and Ramdin reaches out and slaps it through the off side for one
tossed up outside off stump, steered towards backward point
tossed up, he comes forward and defends with a gap between bat and pad, and the ball squeezes through his legs and rolls perilously close to leg stump
tossed up, he sweeps in the air around the corner, a safe shot from Ramdin as there was no one back there
tossed up well outside off stump, Ramdin sweeps and gets rapped on the leg outside the line of the stumps
flatter this time, he gets back and defends
flatter on middle and leg, Ramdin backs away to leg and ends up driving back to Powar
floated up outside off stump and it spins in sharply, beating Ramdin's forward drive, and Dhoni fumbles the collection
flat outside off stump, Chanderpaul steers it towards Harbhajan at gully, who collects it well and fires the throw back at Ramdin's end, but he makes it back safely
tossed up, Ramdin gets stuck at the crease and chips it just over Gambhir at cover, and the ball looks destined for the ropes, but Joginder covers good ground and saves four
tossed up, he looks to dab it fine and narrowly misses getting the edge
tossed up invitingly, he drives to cover, straight to a fielder there
short and wide, he rocks back and cuts to backward point, but they dont get the run as Chanderpaul plays safe
back of a length spinning in from leg stump, he eases back and works it  square for one
tossed up outside off stump, he shuffles across the crease and gets stuck on the back leg
flighted on middle and leg, worked fine for one
pitches outside leg stump and spins in, but Chanderpaul just works it fine for one
tossed up invitingly, he drives against the turn and gets a bit of bottom edge on it

cleaned him up with the last ball of his spell! Tossed up invitingly again, and an impetuous Ramdin charges down the track and heaves across the line, but as he's done all evening Powar gets this to spin in sharply and it disturbs the furniture!
tossed up, he comes forward and steers it to backward point
short and very wide, spinning too much, a shocker, and its duly called wide
flat outside off stump, the wrong 'un, spins away and he works it to midwicket for one
short and wide, good turn on this one, Bradshaw leaves it alone
tossed up sharper, with some lovely spin away from Bradshaw as he lunges forward in defence
flatter this time outside off stump, Bradshaw shuffles and cops one outside the line
tossed up, he gets over it and defends
tossed up outside leg stump, Chanderpaul gets tangled up looking to work it fine
floated up again, he gets forward and just defends it dead as can be
tossed up, it spins away, he plants the foot forward and leaves it alone
tossed up again, he comes over it and defends
once more he invites him to drive, but he defends to the off side
flat and full, he comes forward and drives to cover and he's successfully seen off the threat posed by Bhajji
flat on off stump, Bradshaw neatly punches down the ground to get off the mark
tossed up on off stump, Chanderpaul shuffles and works it past square leg, Zaheer covers good ground and fires in the throw to Dhoni, and the batsmen settle for one
full and flat on off stump, Bradshaw jams the bat down on it
floated up, he gets a stride forward and defends
quicker and flatter, Bradshaw goes back and drives back to Tendulkar
short and wide, he cuts this time, and cant beat Harbhajan at backward point
rubbish ball, well wide of leg stump and thats a wide
slow full toss on off stump, wristily worked into midwicket for one
back of a length just outside leg stump, Bradshaw plays at it and gets hit above the knee roll and ends up with a leg bye to the off side
back of a length on middle and leg, easy pickings for Chanderpaul, who goes back and works it into the leg side
another shocking wide down the side does some good for West Indies
short of a length on the stumps, Bradshaw opens the face and plays it with soft hands in front of Gambhir at point, Chanderpaul sets off very early and they get the single
drifts down leg stump, he tries to flick but ends up with a leg bye to square leg
good length delivery just outside off stump, he comes forward and runs it to Gambhir at point
short and very wide, he reaches for it and slaps it in the gap at cover-point for one out to the sweeper, taking a hand off the bat
tossed up, he drives to cover, cant get it away that time

looped down quicker outside off stump and it stops and turns away, Bradshaw is in no position to play at it in an aggressive manner, which he does, trying some sort of initial cut/slap and through he tries to withdraw the bat, he ends up spooning a simple catch to Gambhir at point
short and seaming away, this is slow medium pace now, Powell chases it but then relieves the shot
another loosener outside off stump, lucky not to get called a wide
flighted up outside off stump, Powell leans into the drive to point
short of a length and moving down leg stump, he tries to pull, doesnt time it, and ends up with a leg bye as Dhoni runs after it and fires in a good throw to Zaheer
good length on middle and leg, Powell hops and works it to the leg side, Zaheer charges in and collects it...a dot ball
back of a length, steered to point for the sharp single, well played

RUN OUT! Short of a length outside off stump, he dabs it fine down to Joginder at third man, who misfields the ball first, encouraging the batsmen to think about the second - what to they always say in school? NEVER run on a misfield, but some people dont learn. Chanderpaul starts off for the second, then sees Joginder throwing the ball back to Dhoni and sends Powell back, but he is caught well short of his crease
good length on the stumps, he plays it back to Zaheer
full toss on leg stump, worked out to Ganguly at deep backward square leg
he bowls seam up, but well wide of off stump and the umpire doesnt call it a wide...I dont believe it! Bad call
again he serves it full and wide and Taylor is forced to reach for it
again quite wide outside off, Taylor looks to run it down, cant connect, that was also very close to being a wide...whats this umpire doing?
shorter, this time he cuts it square of the wicket in the air, one bounce to the fielder in the deep
tossed up outside off stump, he drives into the covers for one
tossed up, Taylor drives it to the sweeper cover but they dont run for the single
dropped in quiet short, he goes for the pull, doesnt connect with bat, off the chin onto the chest and the ball drops between his legs and rolls perilously close to off stump
India go 2-0 up! Full and fast outside off stump, the Zaheer special, to which Chanderpaul loses it all and slogs across the line, missing it and hearing the death rattle behind him
